channel.title: Contributing on Farmer
channel.description: Recent content in Contributing on Farmer

item.title: ARM Basics
item.description: Skip this section if you are already familiar with ARM Templates This won’t be an introduction to Azure Resource Manager or ARM templates. Instead let’s go through the main parts that are important for creating a new resource. The main parts of ARM Templates can be broken into resources, outputs, variables, and parameters. Farmer has limited support for parameters and no support for variables, so we will not cover them.
